title: Yuigon
sinopse:
Prime Minister, Kanata Okazaki's SP (bodyguard), Ryouichi Makita, falls after covering Kanata from a bullet. As his conciousness fades, what came back in Ryouichi's mind was his high school days—when he first met Kanata, who pierced him with his unforgettable eyes....!!

(Source: Peccatore Sanctuary)
